description.title: UK Manufacturers’ Sales by Product (PRODCOM) explorable datasets
description.summary: This dataset presents the latest statistics from the UK Manufacturers' Sales by Product Survey. It provides value and volume estimates of manufacturers’ sales by 8-digit product code from businesses based in the UK, a derived unit value, and total values by 2-digit industrial division of UK SIC 2007/Nace Rev 2.
description.metaDescription: This dataset presents the latest statistics from the UK Manufacturers' Sales by Product Survey. It provides value and volume estimates of manufacturers’ sales by 8-digit product code from businesses based in the UK, a derived unit value, and total values by 2-digit industrial division of UK SIC 2007/Nace Rev 2.
